name: Dwarf Fortress (itch)
description:
You are a Dwarfs, to survive against the Zombie you must shoot on them with your turrets !

But...sometime...it's happen that that your turrets can be broken, so, you need to repair them with some actions on it :D

GGJ 2020 : Repair.

Compatible with keyboards, Xbox Controller and PS4 Controller.

1 player

Dev & sounds : Anton "Algost" Bodin Marty 

Dev & Design : Nicolas "Paploum" Constanty

Music : Thibaut "Oathr" Delafforest

Command :
Keyboard : Press "Space" near a turret to start repair it

Xbox Controller : Press "A" near a turret to start repair it

Ps4 Controller : Press "X" near a turret to start repair it
